name: Blue Cheese Beef Tenderloin
author: J MILLER
summary: This is a recipe for whole beef tenderloin baked and topped with a blue cheese sauce.
directions: Place beef in a shallow dish
Combine teriyaki sauce, red wine and garlic; pour over beef
Allow beef to marinate in refrigerator for 30 minutes
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Place tenderloin on broiler pan, and cook in preheated oven for 15 minutes
Reduce heat to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C), and cook for 30 to 40 more minutes, or to desired doneness
Allow to set for 10 minutes before slicing
In a saucepan over low heat, combine blue cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream and Worcestershire sauce
Stir until smooth; serve over sliced tenderloin
